english_example_sentence: If you hadn't walked carefully on that slippery ground, you would definitely have fallen to the ground.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы ты не шёл осторожно по этой скользкой земле, ты бы точно упал на землю.
turkish_example_sentence: O kaygan zeminde dikkatli yürümeseydin, kesinlikle yere düşecektin.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: O kaygan zeminde dikkatli yürümeseydin, kesinlikle yere ______.
